page.title: 05THE SCHOOL
page.content: {TOWARD SCHOOL Staff:Mr.A.B.Walpole(Headteacher) Mrs.T.McKendrick Toward primary school is a typical rural school.It was built in 1875 and is 110 yrs.old. 105 yrs.after it was built (in 1980) an extension was added.This gave the school two new classrooms and the existing classrooms were changed into a lunch hall and a kitchen. Toward school has two teachers and 29 pupils.The headteacher takes classes 4,5,6 and 7 the other teacher takes classes 1,2 and 3. Toward school has superb facilities and is a great school (according to me) {By {IAIN MCFARLANE {_________________
